column3:
Dibrugarh East - 1. Downstream of stone spur No V of DTP dyke 2. Bank 
damages at downstream of VI of DTP dyke | 1. severe bank damages is reported 
due to river Brahmaputra at downstream of stone spur No V at around 9.00 pm as 
report recfrom Water resource Department. The depth of erosion observed is to be 
around 20m and is still going on. 3 no of porcupine were launched to divert the 
flow. A minimum of 30m remaining only from the toe of the dyke to the present 
bank line. GPS Co-ordinate are 27°29'17.61"N to 94°54'32.24"E to 27°29'16.45"N/ 
94°54'29.53"E. 2. Active bank damages is seen at Downstream of stone spur No VI 
of DTP dyke . Reached length 20m on 04/06/2023 as received from Water Resource 
Department. GPS Co-ordinate are - 27°29'9.8"N , 94°54'15.0"E to 27°29'9.5"N to 
94°54'14.3"E | 0 | (Long - 27.290000, Lat - 94.540000)
